description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Hack and slash your way through hoards of enemies, with up to 3 other players.  Upgrade your character's skills while working to accomplish a sinister goal.  Featuring a unique dual-stick control scheme, for both melee and ranged combat.  Corrupted’s campaign and arena modes provide hours of fun!
